Enabling People.

Coinsence.org is a decentralized platform that provides a range of tools to empower people,
organizations and communities to collaborate on initiatives that benefits society.

Start scrolling to see how easy it is to get started
Join us Login
Supporting organisations and Partners
01
We are here to

Strengthen civil society

We support nonprofits, grassroot organizations and social entrepreneurs in addressing local and global challenges that societies are facing today.

Get started
02
We are here to

Create synergies

We support nonprofits, grassroot organizations and social entrepreneurs in addressing local and global challenges that societies are facing today.

Get started
03
We are here to

Joint value creation

We support nonprofits, grassroot organizations and social entrepreneurs in addressing local and global challenges that societies are facing today.

Get started

Change
Makers.

Take action and contribute with your talents to projects you care about. Coinsence ensures that your engagement gets rewarded.

Find interesting projects and tasks

Social
Innovators.

Drive change and implement your own solutions to global challenges. Coinsence supports you to secure funding and get your project started.

Create your project

Impact
investors.

Invest into the impact you want to see or seek out support for your own challenges. Coinsence facilitates participative decision-making and ensures maximum transparency and accountability.

Create your challenge

Socially
aware
business.

Show appreciation and reward socially engaged customers with discounts to products and services. You want to go one step further? Get your team involved and contribute with collective intelligence to those projects you care about. Coinsence makes your organisationâ€™s commitment visible.

Offer your resources
